page.title: 20Local News
page.content: In Tollesbury we have just had some local council elections and for the first time a{liberal/alliance candidate was elected, Mr. John Loxley. It has been exceptionally wet this summer and recently we have had a flood, some houses had up to 2 feet of water. In school several things have gone missing, the video, four calculators and over Â£5.00 have gone missing. In the village there have also been some thefts in the last few days:_ 2 car radios, a set of golf clubs, a B.M.W. car and Â£60.00 from a house in East street.
